name: Masae Seki VR Art Gallery
description:
Fans and soon-to-be fans can view the beautiful artwork of Masae Seki in this VR experience. This character designer's exhibit hosts a variety of pieces including fluffy animals, whimsical creatures, mysterious yokai, wholesome moments, and more!

Teleport up close to see fine details or take a step back to admire the full view.  Most importantly, relax, take your time, and enjoy!


More from Masae Seki here:

Tested and played on HTC Vive, configured to work with Valve Index and Oculus Touch. Requires SteamVR.

Controls:

Teleport - Click and hold the touchpad in the middle or move the analog stick forward to display a target marker. Release to teleport to target marker's location.

Turn left/right - Click the sides of the touchpad or move the analog stick to the side to turn in that direction.

If you are experiencing any issues, feel free to reach out and I'll troubleshoot with you as best as I can!
